name: Blood Soaked
Blood Blessed
desc: The dagger had been used in a ritual of some sort. No matter how much you clean it, the dagger continues to drip with blood.

name: Blood Covered
Blood Painted
Blood Red
desc: The blade of the dagger is a deep crimson. A sign of having been blessed by use in a ritual of some kind.

name: Sharpened
desc: The twisted blade has been sharpened recently.
